headline: What Visa (V)'s Mercuryo Partnership Reveals About Its Web3 Cross-Border Payments Strategy
summary: In January 2026, Mercuryo announced a partnership with Visa that integrates Visa Direct to enable fast, low-cost crypto-to-fiat off-ramping directly onto Visa credit and debit cards worldwide. By plugging Visa’s real-time payments network into Mercuryo’s non-custodial wallets, exchanges and payment platforms, millions of users can convert digital tokens into local currencies without leaving the services they already use. headline: Stocks Set for Muted Open After Trump’s Tariff Threats, Big Tech Earnings and Fed Meeting in Focus
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are down -0.05%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are down -0.14% this morning, pointing to a muted open on Wall Street as President Trump’s tariff threats against Canada and the looming risk of a partial U.S. government shutdown curbed risk appetite at the start of a busy week.
